©2016 Samsung Electronics America, Inc. Samsung, Samsung Galaxy S, Samsung
Gear VR, and Samsung Gear 360 are all trademarks of Samsung Electronics Co.,
Ltd. Use only in accordance with law. Other company and product names
mentioned may be trademarks of their respective owners. Screen images
simulated; actual appearance of devices may vary. Sequences shortened. Gear VR
and Gear 360 sold separately. Gear VR: Read and follow warnings and instructions
with the Headset before use. The Headset should be calibrated before each use.
Not for use by children under 13. A virtual reality experience may trigger health
reactions. See a doctor before use if you have a history of seizures. Stop use if you
experience health reactions. Compatible with select Samsung Galaxy devices.

Dual Cam: up to 3840 x 1920 (30fps)\nSingle Cam: up to 2560 x 1440 (30fps)
Dual Cam: up to 7776 x 3888 (30fps)\nSingle Cam: 3072 x 1728 (5M)
